thread.title: Sour grapes? ‘Top Gear’ show not worth Netflix’ money
thread.title_full: Sour grapes? ‘Top Gear’ show not worth Netflix’ money - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sour grapes? ‘Top Gear’ show not worth Netflix’ money
text: Netflix is one of the high-profile players that reportedly bid for the prominent Top Gear car TV show earlier this year, losing to Amazon, which is rumored to have bought 36 new episodes starring Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond, and James May for around $250 million. However, the popular streaming service says that Amazon overpaid for this particular show. DON’T MISS: NYT: New Apple TV will rival Xbox One and PS4, but with a huge twist The trio of presenters departed the BBC shortly after Clarkson was fired, with Netflix said to have been the front-runner at one point to scoop them up for a similar show. However, Netflix’ chief product officer told Digital Spy that the new Top Gear “wasn’t worth the money.” »
